item.title: How A People-First Approach Will Help Your Pod Succeed
item.description: You've reached the stage of exploring the option of utilizing the pod structure or maybe you've already started it. You've reviewed the different guides talking about processes, structure and efficiency.

item.title: How Using a Monorepo is Helping Us Work Better
item.description: As any other mature startup moving to its growth stage, Minute MediaÂ had to rebuild its infrastructure. Our initial infrastructure was a Monolithic application in Ruby on Rails.
